title: The Seven Herbs of Spring
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Parsley, shepherd’s purse, uhh.... What were the rest again?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>They’re cudweed, chickweed, nipplewort, turnip, and radish.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Oooh~, you remember all of them, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yeah. I’ve been making the seven-herb porridge with my mother since I was little.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Wow, that’s amazing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>*Growl*~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>? Shizuku-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I-, I’m sorry!! I only had the porridge this morning, so I’m a little hungry....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahaha, it’s not enough for a growing girl, right? Alright, I’ll treat you to something! Let’s go~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Eeeh!? T-, there’s no need, I’m fine....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>I’m also feeling quite hungry, so why don’t we stop by somewhere, Shizuku-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Uuu.... Then I shall accompany you! Let’s get going, You-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
